name: event_alert
description: Aesthetic Instagram post template with centered CTA, extended background, and subtle gradients

samples.event_highlight: Learn AI innovations from industry experts

fieldPrompt.company_name: Enter your company or organization name (e.g., Tech Innovators Inc., Your Company Name). This will be displayed at the top of the event announcement and establishes credibility as the event host.
fieldPrompt.event_type: Write the type of event (max 20 characters) that clearly communicates what attendees can expect. Examples: FREE WEBINAR, LIVE WORKSHOP, CONFERENCE, NETWORKING EVENT. Use caps for emphasis and clarity.
fieldPrompt.event_date: Enter the event date (max 20 characters) in a clear, readable format. Examples: July 16, Aug 5, 2023, Every Tuesday in June. Make it easy for attendees to remember and plan.
fieldPrompt.event_time: Enter the event time (max 20 characters) with timezone if relevant. Examples: 2:00 PM EST, 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM, 7:00 PM PST. Include timezone to avoid confusion for attendees in different locations.
fieldPrompt.event_highlight: Write the main event title or highlight (max 75 characters) that will be the most prominent text on the announcement. This should capture attention and communicate the core value of attending. Examples: Master Digital Marketing in 2024, AI Revolution Workshop.
fieldPrompt.register_details: Enter clear registration instructions that tell attendees exactly how to sign up. Examples: Register at our website, Link in bio, Email to RSVP, Scan QR code. Make it simple and actionable.
fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with a clean, professional background that highlights the product's features. Include specific details about lighting, composition, and any relevant props or context that showcase the product's use or benefits.
